articles.title: The oldest-known humpback whale recording was hiding in an archive
articles.title_tr: The oldest-known humpback whale recording was hiding in an archive
articles.summary:
The audio, etched onto a plastic disc in 1949, predates the era when researchers could even recognize whale calls.
The post The oldest-known humpback whale recording was hiding in an archive appeared first on Popular Science.

articles.title: Scotland change four for 'biggest game of season' with England
articles.title_tr: Scotland change four for 'biggest game of season' with England
articles.summary: Jamie Ritchie, Nathan McBeth, George Turner and Gregor Brown come into the Scotland XV for Saturday's Six Nations meeting with England, with head coach Gregor Townsend saying it is "always our biggest game of the season".

articles.title: AK Parti'den yerel yönetimlere Ramazan genelgesi
articles.title_tr: AK Parti'den yerel yönetimlere Ramazan genelgesi
articles.summary: Ramazan ayına sayılı günler kala AK Parti'den yerel yönetimlere bir genelge gönderildi. Genelgede, belediyelerden ramazan ayının ruhuna uygun programların yapılması istendi. Genelgede "sosyal yardım" vurgusu da var.

articles.title: THY'nin 500'üncü uçağının özel uçuşu en çok takip edilen uçuş oldu
articles.title_tr: THY'nin 500'üncü uçağının özel uçuşu en çok takip edilen uçuş oldu
articles.summary: Türk Hava Yollarının (THY) filosuna kattığı 500'üncü uçağın bugün gerçekleştirdiği özel uçuş, "FlightRadar24" uygulamasında dünyada en çok takip edilen uçuş oldu.

articles.title: Rutte: NATO’da birlik ve savunma kararlılığında yeni dönem başladı
articles.title_tr: Rutte: NATO’da birlik ve savunma kararlılığında yeni dönem başladı
articles.summary: NATO Genel Sekreteri Mark Rutte, Brüksel’deki Savunma Bakanları Toplantısı sonrası yaptığı açıklamada, müttefiklerin savunma harcamalarında kayda değer ilerleme kaydettiğini ve Avrupa’nın NATO içinde daha fazla sorumluluk üstlendiğini söyledi. Rutte, ABD’nin ittifaka tam destek verdiğini vurguladı.

articles.title: Overwatch Players Are Finding Devious (And Hilarious) Ways To Use Jetpack Cat
articles.title_tr: Overwatch Players Are Finding Devious (And Hilarious) Ways To Use Jetpack Cat
articles.summary: Earlier this week, Overwatch debuted the game's latest support hero, Jetpack Cat. But it hasn't taken long for players to figure how to utilize Jetpack Cat's abilities in unexpected ways that are making Overwatch's battles even wilder than before.For example, using Jetpack Cat to carry allies can give a team a tactical advantage as they rain fire from above.          One Overwatch player on Instagram described the following pairing of Jetpack Cat and Reaper as "the chandelier of death and despair."Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: 3D Yazıcı Teknolojisinde Yeni Dönem!
articles.title_tr: 3D Yazıcı Teknolojisinde Yeni Dönem!
articles.summary: Çoğu insan 3D yazıcıları plastik parçalar, basit aletler veya oyuncaklar üretmek için kullanılan cihazlar olarak tanıyor. Ancak iş metal basmaya geldiğinde süreç çok daha karmaşık ve zorlu bir hal alıyor. Metaller aşırı yüksek ısı gerektiriyor ve ısıtılıp hızlıca soğutulduklarında yapısal olarak bozulabiliyorlar veya istenmeyen tepkiler verebiliyorlar. Hiroshima Üniversitesi’ndeki bilim insanları, tungsten karbür kobalt malzemesini tamamen […]

articles.title: Erdoğan: Sırbistan'la ticaret hedefimize adım adım yaklaşıyoruz
articles.title_tr: Erdoğan: Sırbistan'la ticaret hedefimize adım adım yaklaşıyoruz
articles.summary: Cumhurbaşkanı Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, Sırbistan Cumhurbaşkanı Aleksandar Vučić ile görüşmesinde Balkanlar'da istikrar ve ekonomik kalkınmanın önemine vurgu yaparak, iki ülke arasındaki ticaret hacminin 3,5 milyar dolara ulaştığını ve 5 milyar dolarlık hedefe yaklaşıldığını söyledi.

articles.title: Lufthansa’da grev krizi: 800 uçuş iptal, 100 binden fazla yolcu etkilendi
articles.title_tr: Lufthansa’da grev krizi: 800 uçuş iptal, 100 binden fazla yolcu etkilendi
articles.summary: Alman hava yolu şirketi Lufthansa'da pilotlar ve kabin ekibinin 24 saatlik grevi nedeniyle 800 uçuş iptal edildi. Frankfurt ve Münih başta olmak üzere ülke genelinde 100 binden fazla yolcu grevden etkilenirken, sendikalar taleplerin karşılanmaması halinde yeni eylemlerin gündeme gelebileceğini bildirdi.

articles.title: Battlefield 6 Season 2 Brings New Maps, More Guns, And LTMs
articles.title_tr: Battlefield 6 Season 2 Brings New Maps, More Guns, And LTMs
articles.summary: Following a brief delay, the much-anticipated Season 2 update will finally arrive to Battlefield 6 and Redsec on February 17. Battlefield Studios has now revealed the full roadmap of content players can expect for Season 2, including new maps, more guns to unlock, and additional vehicles. There will also be limited-time modes and a new battle pass to level up.Just like Season 1, Battlefield 6's Season 2 content will be released in three phases: Extreme Measures, Nightfall, and Hunter/Prey.Extreme Measure launches on February 17, and this first phase of content includes the new Contaminated multiplayer map, three new guns, two new gadgets, and the return of Battlefield's AH-6 Little Bird as an additional vehicle. The update also includes the new VL-7 psychoactive smoke, which is described as "distorting the battlefield" with non-lethal hallucinogenic effects.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.summary: Şişli'deki başı kesik kadın cinayeti soruşturması derinleştirildi ve 36 yaşındaki Durdona Khokimova isimli kadını öldüren iki kişinin bir gün önce başka bir kadını daha öldürdüğü ortaya çıktı. Cesedi evden çöp poşetleriyle çıkarıp farklı konteynerlere atmışlar.

articles.title: Here's This Week's Free Game From The Epic Games Store On Mobile
articles.title_tr: Here's This Week's Free Game From The Epic Games Store On Mobile
articles.summary: For the last couple of years, the Epic Games Store has given away free games every week through its PC storefront. With the company having launched its own mobile store, it has also started a second free games program on iOS and Android devices, kicking things off with a curated library of titles and weekly freebies. The app also features mobile versions of Fortnite, Fall Guys, and Rocket League Sideswipe.To access these games you will need to create a free Epic account and install the free Epic Games Store mobile app and log in with your account, but once you do, you can start claiming your free games every Thursday through it. One other thing to note is that Android users can access the app via Android-based emulation devices like Retroid Pocket, as they aren't limited to just smartphone and tablets.           Download the Epic Games Store Mobile app For now, only iOS users in the European Union can install the app, but the app is available worldwide to Android device users and they have a wider selection of games to choose from in comparison. Like its PC counterpart, you'll have one week to grab each game that's offered. Here's a closer look at what you can grab this week, and what the current mobile games library has to offer. You can also explore what the free PC games are this week on the Epic Games Store.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: GTA 6 Could Bring In This Staggering Amount Of Money
articles.title_tr: GTA 6 Could Bring In This Staggering Amount Of Money
articles.summary: Grand Theft Auto 6 is one of the most heavily hyped video games ever, and everyone is expecting the game to have a giant launch later this year. But just how much money could the game bring in?According to broker data company Visible Alpha, GTA 6 is estimated to reach $5 billion in revenue by 2030, the Financial Times reported. It could sell 100 million copies by that time period, the firm predicted.This follows on from a previous estimate from DFC Intelligence that said GTA 6 could sell 40 million copies and bring in $3.2 billion during its first year alone. That figure includes revenue from physical and digital game sales, as well as microtransactions. DFC also predicted that GTA 6 will get another sales boost when it comes to the (unannounced but expected) next PlayStation and Xbox consoles, as well as PC.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title_tr: Cumhurbaşkanı Erdoğan, Vucic ile bir araya geldi. "Barış ve huzurun tesisi için çalışıyoruz"

articles.title: Master Chief-Like Overwatch Hero Has Players Dreaming Of A Halo Crossover
articles.title_tr: Master Chief-Like Overwatch Hero Has Players Dreaming Of A Halo Crossover
articles.summary: Overwatch players might feel as if they're facing off against a Spartan in recent matches. Fans were quick to draw comparisons between Emre, one of five new heroes added to Blizzard's multiplayer shooter, to Master Chief from Halo, prompting some to clamor for an official crossover.As observed by GamesRadar, the resemblance between Emre's abilities and Halo mechanics go beyond the character just being a guy with a gun--his three-round-burst rifle is remarkably like the Battle Rifle from the Xbox-published franchise, and his semi-automatic pistol packs a punch like Halo's Magnum.And not only do his frag grenades behave like Halo grenades (even letting players grenade jump), but one of Emre's perks can make them stick to opponents. You can even argue that his passive health regeneration ability is similar to how a Spartan would regenerate armor. And to top it all off, he interacts with a Cortana-like AI program.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: Put On Your Detective Fedora For This Week's Epic Games Store Freebies
articles.title_tr: Put On Your Detective Fedora For This Week's Epic Games Store Freebies
articles.summary: The Epic Games Store continues to give away a free game each week, and this week's offering is another nice find at a price that can't be beat. Every Thursday at 8 AM PT / 11 AM ET, Epic offers at least one free PC game (and sometimes even as many as two or three). All you need to do to claim the free games is create a free Epic account and enable two-factor authentication. You have a week to add the freebies to your library before the new one(s) take their place. At this point, Epic has given away hundreds of free games, and there's no sign that the program will stop any time soon. The company has also extended its freebies to Android devices, and you can claim a free game every week here as well. We keep this article up to date weekly to highlight both the current free games and next week's offerings.If you're looking for more freebies, you can check out our list of the 25 best free PC games to play right now, or for more options, the 25 best free games to play on multiple platforms.Current free games at Epic Continue Reading at GameSpot
articles.summary_tr: The Epic Games Store continues to give away a free game each week, and this week's offering is another nice find at a price that can't be beat. Every Thursday at 8 AM PT / 11 AM ET, Epic offers at least one free PC game (and sometimes even as many as two or three). All you need to do to claim the free games is create a free Epic account and enable two-factor authentication. You have a week to add the freebies to your library before the new one(s) take their place. At this point, Epic has given away hundreds of free games, and there's no sign that the program will stop any time soon. articles.title_tr: NATO Genel Sekreteri Rutte: Avrupa daha fazla sorumluluk almalı
articles.summary: NATO Genel Sekreteri Mark Rutte, ittifakın içinden geçtiği zihniyet değişimi doğrultusunda, ABD'nin nükleer ve konvansiyonel varlığını sürdürmesiyle birlikte Avrupa'nın daha fazla sorumluluk, liderlik rolü üstlenmesinin NATO'yu daha güçlü hale getireceğini söyledi.

articles.title: Oyunlardaki Türk Karakter ve Mekanlar!
articles.title_tr: Oyunlardaki Türk Karakter ve Mekanlar!
articles.summary: Dünya çapında hızla büyüyen dijital oyun ekosistemi içerisinde Türkiye, hem yerel geliştiricilerin imzasını taşıyan projelerle hem de devasa bütçeli uluslararası yapımlara ilham veren kültürel dokusuyla giderek daha belirgin bir konuma yerleşiyor. Oyun dünyası artık sadece teknik bir eğlence alanı olmaktan çıkıp; ülkelerin tarihini, mimari mirasını ve toplumsal karakterini yansıtan dijital birer vitrin haline gelmiş durumda. […]

articles.title_tr: Zamanı Olmayanlar Toplansın: Süresi 90 Dakikadan Kısa Olan Harika Filmler
articles.summary: Bazen film izlemek istersiniz ancak o filme ayıracak 2-3 saatiniz yoktur. İşte burada kısa süreli yapımlar devreye girer. Sizin için süresi 90 dakika ve altında olan harika filmleri derledik.

articles.title: Leclerc tops Norris as Red Bull, Mercedes suffer issues at Bahrain test
articles.title_tr: Leclerc tops Norris as Red Bull, Mercedes suffer issues at Bahrain test
articles.summary: Ferrari's Charles Leclerc finished ahead of McLaren's Lando Norris at the top of the timesheet on the second day of Formula 1's pre-season test in Bahrain as their rivals Mercedes and Red Bull suffered technical issues.
